## Discussion

This property returns the custom image you provide at initialization, or a system image when using a concrete subclass like [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPContactCallButton].

CarPlay doesn’t support animated images. If you provide an animated image, this property returns the first image in the animation sequence.

# image

**Instance Property**

The button’s image.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var image: UIImage? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property returns the custom image you provide at initialization, or a system image when using a concrete subclass like [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPContactCallButton].

CarPlay doesn’t support animated images. If you provide an animated image, this property returns the first image in the animation sequence.
title: image
